user.title: Set up Octopus Agile Companion
user.description: Enter your Octopus Energy API key and tariff details. You can find these in your Octopus Energy dashboard under Developer settings.

data_description.api_key: Your Octopus Energy API key from the developer dashboard
data_description.fetch_window_start: Start of window when tomorrow's rates are fetched (usually 16:00)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Octopus Energy API.

init.title: Octopus Agile Companion Options
init.description: Configure your preferences for rate monitoring and alerts.

data_description.consecutive_periods: Comma-separated list of periods to track cheapest windows for (e.g., 30,60,120,180)
data_description.cheap_threshold: Rates below this are considered cheap - triggers binary sensor
data_description.expensive_threshold: Rates above this are considered expensive - triggers binary sensor

analytics.title: Analytics & Savings Settings
analytics.description: Configure advanced analytics for savings calculations, usage profiling, and solar/battery optimization.

data_description.usage_profile: Select the profile that best matches your household usage pattern
data_description.daily_kwh: Your typical daily electricity consumption in kWh
data_description.flat_rate_comparison: Flat rate tariff to compare savings against (default: Ofgem price cap)
data_description.battery_capacity: Home battery capacity in kWh (set to 0 if no battery)
data_description.export_rate: Your SEG export rate in p/kWh for solar optimization
data_description.enable_carbon_tracking: Enable grid carbon intensity tracking from National Grid

get_rates.name: Get rates
get_rates.description: Retrieve electricity rates for a specific date.

get_cheapest_slots.name: Get cheapest slots
get_cheapest_slots.description: Find the cheapest time slots for a given date.

get_expensive_slots.name: Get most expensive slots
get_expensive_slots.description: Find the most expensive time slots for a given date.

estimate_cost.name: Estimate daily cost
estimate_cost.description: Estimate your daily electricity cost based on usage profile and compare to flat-rate tariffs.

date.name: Date
date.description: Date to estimate cost for (YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to today.

daily_kwh.name: Daily kWh
daily_kwh.description: Your daily electricity consumption in kWh.

usage_profile.name: Usage profile
usage_profile.description: Household usage pattern (working_family, home_worker, retired, ev_owner, flat).

flat_rate.name: Flat rate
flat_rate.description: Flat rate tariff to compare against (p/kWh).

suggest_load_time.name: Suggest best load time
suggest_load_time.description: Get recommendations for the best time to run appliances based on upcoming rates.

load_kwh.name: Load (kWh)
load_kwh.description: Total energy consumption of the appliance in kWh.

duration_hours.name: Duration (hours)
duration_hours.description: How long the appliance runs for.

analyze_export.name: Analyze solar/battery export
analyze_export.description: Get recommendations for battery charging and solar export optimization.

date.name: Date
date.description: Date to analyze (YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to today.

export_rate.name: Export rate
export_rate.description: Your SEG export rate in p/kWh.

battery_capacity.name: Battery capacity
battery_capacity.description: Your home battery capacity in kWh.

get_carbon_intensity.name: Get carbon intensity
get_carbon_intensity.description: Get current or forecast grid carbon intensity from National Grid.

forecast.name: Forecast
forecast.description: If true, return forecast data instead of current.

postcode.name: Postcode
postcode.description: UK postcode for regional carbon intensity.
